description: Regenerates the secondary policy key of the specified authorization policy.

primarykey.description: Primary key associated with the policy.

secondarykey.description: Secondary key associated with the policy.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

subscription_id.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

permissions.description: The permissions associated with the policy.
